channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-44798] Fix Scala 2.13 mima check after SPARK-44705 merged
item.description:
[error] spark-core: Failed binary compatibility check against org.apache.spark:spark-core_2.13:3.4.0! Found 1 potential problems (filtered 4019)

item.summary: Fix Scala 2.13 mima check after SPARK-44705 merged

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
